name: Acrylate copolymers containing up to 2 percent by weight of 2-propenoic acid, 4-(((4-benzoylphenoxy)carbonyl)oxy)butyl ester
FoodContactSubstance: Acrylate copolymers containing up to 2 percent by weight of 2-propenoic acid, 4-(((4-benzoylphenoxy)carbonyl)oxy)butyl ester (CAS Reg. No. 131513-00-3) along with 2-propenoic acid, n-butyl-2-propenoate, 2-ethylhexyl 2-propenoate, methyl 2-propenoate, and/or 2-methyl-2-propenoic acid methyl ester (CAS Reg. Nos. 25265-15-0; 98060-25-4; 25119-83-9).
